author: julianfoad
msg: Revert r7770 ("Speed up the regression tests") because, to quote Branko,
The repository loader only depends on the dumpfile parser (which is pretty
simple and stable) and libsvn_fs, which has its own exhaustive tests. "svn
import", on the other hand, depends on all the libraries. Therefore, using
"svnadmin load" to prepare the initial tree give us much better confidence
that the tests start in a consistent state than using "svn import".
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svntest/actions.py
(guarantee_greek_repository): Dump and load the greek tree instead of
importing it.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svntest/main.py
(pristine_dir): Restored.

author: cmpilato
msg: Alas, another (not-really-so-)long-awaited filesystem schema change.
Merge in all the changes from the issue-1578-dev branch.  This
completes both issue #1578 (bugs in the FS history algorithm) and
issue #1595 (break transaction cleanup into multiple DB transactions).
See the relevant log messages for the branch between revisions 7630
and 7750 for more details.

author: sussman
msg: * project_issues.html:  mention users@ list too.

author: kfogel
msg: Thanks to D.J. Heap for pointing out a misleading progress message,
in (already resolved) issue #1579:
* subversion/svnadmin/main.c
(subcommand_recover): Don't claim that the lock is acquired and
recovery begun when we don't know this to be true.

author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r7628:
A few spots didn't get converted to use APR_MD5_DIGESTSIZE instead of
MD5_DIGESTSIZE; fix them.
